channel.title: Socorro County|New Mexico|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Socorro County|New Mexico|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-380 East - Tularosa Valley Watershed
item.description: Entering the Tularosa Valley Watershed on US-380 east. The Tularosa Valley is a closed basin and does not flow to the sea.

item.title: US-380 East at NM-1
item.description: US-380 east at NM-1 junction in San Antonio. NM-1 parallels I-25 between Truth of Consequences and Socorro.

item.title: US-380 East Approaching NM-1
item.description: US-380 east approaching NM-1 in San Antonio.

item.title: I-25 North - Exit 139
item.description: I-25 north at Exit 139 - US-380 East/San Antonio/Carrizozo. This is the western terminus of US-380.

item.title: I-25 North Approaching US-380
item.description: I-25 north approaching US-380 (Exit 139). Use US-380 east for Smokey Bear Historical Park, and Lincoln State Monument.

item.title: I-25 North - Exit 139
item.description: I-25 north approaching Exit 139 - US-380 East/San Antonio/Carrizozo.

item.title: I-25 North Approaching Exit 124
item.description: I-25 north approaching Exit 124 - San Marcial.

item.title: I-25 North - Exit 115
item.description: I-25 north at Exit 115 - NM-107/Camino Real International Heritage Center.
